message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for a steal! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity that I think you won't want to pass up.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I would like to counterpropose a price of $16000.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we meet at $17500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $16500 for the product.
I'm not quite ready to give up yet, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we meet at $18000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counterpropose a price of $17000 for the product.
I'm starting to think you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about we meet at $18250?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counterpropose a price of $17750 for the product.
I'm not budging much more, Bob! I'm willing to make one final concession, but I need to get as close to my minimum price as possible. How about we meet at $18500?
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. Considering all our previous negotiations, I would like to propose a final price of $18000 for the product.
